reply.content: Hi. Please send me some details about your issue by email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

author: James Webster
comment: Great face. Love it. Go premium its worth it.

author: Eziilee Howell
comment: S app has everything in need, this is the first app which allows me to put Jamaica time on my watch face. I also on a Tissot touch this watch face is very similar where I can choose to set my alarm, timer stopwatch calories ECT. Must have

author: Randy Guidry
comment: Cool

reply.content: Hi. What is your watch device? Did you install the watch face on your watch too? Do not hesitate to contact me by email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

comment: Rubbish! Difficult to use. And stole my money.

author: Arry Ferrari
comment: Does not update anymore

author: dan clark
comment: Looks cool and works well on LG urban

author: Stephen G
comment: Why have this in s3 watch face collection.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. As described in BOLD on the Play store page, this application is an Android Wear watch face, not compatible with Gear S2 nor S3, running Tizen. Your rating is a bit unfair, because this is not an issue of the application :) The Gear S2 / S3 watch face are in the Samsung Galaxy Apps store, you can find my designs by searching "thema"

reply.content: Hi. What is your watch device? Can you give me some details about your issue? Please send me an email to thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you.

author: Tim Tawlks
comment: Cool

author: Jarett Bailey
comment: I love the features on this watch face.  The ability to customize its widgets is perfectly designed.  Appearance customizability is exactly what I'm looking for.  And the Dev,  Thomas, has been very helpful and quick to respond with technical questions.

author: Steve Fice
comment: Great looking watch face and loads of features that I never thought I'd need - being able to set a timer with just two clicks for example, so handy!  /u/UKDarkJedi

author: Steve S.
comment: I've been looking for the perfect watch face for my Huawei watch. This might finally be the one! Great layout with many useful features easily accessible. Great work! - wrxr7

author: Shane P
comment: AW2.0, 4 shortcuts, 3 widgets, lots of customizations, and battery levels are shown. Perfect amount for a watch face!! -spectradawn77

author: Claes Klingvall
comment: Great looking watch face with quick access to many useful watch apps. Good work! Reddit: klingsurf

author: Ryan Hartwell
comment: Nice "at-a-glance" layout, and great color choices. Looks great on my Huawei - rybread613

author: Adam MacAulay
comment: Great face, looks nice on my fossil q Marshall (from Reddit)

comment: Lfaria123 - Really like the overall look of it specially on my Huwawei Watch

comment: Beautiful watchface, lovely on the Huawei Watch (Reddit Kolma528)

comment: Good looking watch face. Tresboston

comment: Great watchface! (Reddit:dotter_ak)

author: Ethan Osmundson
comment: I love the watch

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
After purchasing on wear, the Google play services can take some time to sync the purchase on mobile.
Just going in the "My apps" section of the mobile Play Store seems to force the sync and solve the issue. This is a Google store issue.

author: Raj Maniar
comment: Nice

author: Chan Vincent
comment: Very nice watch face! Love the amount of info you can place on the watch face, such as having watch battery, phone battery, and 3 other widgets. I've a question though. What's the difference between the 4 prices for premium?

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. There are no difference: all prices unlock the same "premium". It is just a "give what you want", based on how much you value the watch face ;)

comment: Great watch face!  Even better if you get premium.
